attributes.additional_details: Having a better understanding in jewellery in school and why there should be a more of a opportunity to show your identity instead of looking the same as everyone and earring the same clothes.
attributes.background: Understand the problems with uniform and ways to improve it

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about certain rules relating to school uniforms, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Ban schools from setting rules about personal appearance of students: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/611540

Ban school uniforms in English schools: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607158
